hero.subtitle: We support businesses and individuals with effective legal solutions, solid expertise, and professional service since 2020.

about.title: Legal excellence and innovation
about.p1: Founded in 2020, Axe Legal has become one of the most respected legal advisory firms in Benin. Our mission is to provide innovative, tailor-made legal solutions to our clients—entrepreneurs, businesses and individuals.
about.p2: We combine strong technical expertise with a human and personalized approach, ensuring high-quality support at every stage of your legal journey.

features.strategy_desc: Tailor-made advice and actionable roadmaps to protect and grow your interests.
features.responsiveness_desc: Fast interventions, prioritization of urgent matters, and strict compliance with procedural deadlines.
features.support_desc: Personal follow-up, clear explanations, and a trusted relationship throughout the matter.
features.excellence_desc: Rigorous practice and recognized expertise for lasting, measurable outcomes.

why_choose_us.title: Why choose Axe Legal?
why_choose_us.subtitle: Discover the values and commitments that make us your trusted legal partner

reasons.expertise_desc: In-depth knowledge of OHADA law and local realities for precise, practical advice.
reasons.human_desc: We put the client relationship at the heart of our practice with listening, empathy and full transparency.
reasons.results_desc: A 95% success rate driven by rigorous legal strategy and unwavering commitment.
reasons.confidentiality_desc: Maximum protection of your information—strict professional secrecy guaranteed.
reasons.availability_desc: A responsive team available for legal emergencies, even outside business hours.
reasons.excellence_desc: A firm trusted and recommended by our clients for exceptional service quality.

faq.title: Have questions?
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our legal services
faq.bottom_text: Can’t find the answer to your question?

0.q: How much does a legal consultation cost?
0.a: The first consultation is free. It allows us to assess your situation and propose a tailored quote aligned with your needs. Our fees are transparent and competitive.

1.q: Which documents should I prepare for my first consultation?
1.a: To make the most of our meeting, bring any documents related to your matter: contracts, letters, evidence, prior judgments, ID documents, etc. If you don’t have everything, don’t worry—we’ll guide you.

2.a: Yes. We understand legal fees can be an investment. We offer flexible payment plans and packages adapted to your budget. Contact us to discuss options.

3.q: Can I contact you outside office hours?
3.a: Absolutely. For legal emergencies, we provide 24/7 assistance. You can reach us by phone, email or WhatsApp. We aim to respond as quickly as possible.

4.q: Do you work with companies or only individuals?
4.a: We advise both individuals and businesses (SMEs, startups and larger companies). Our services cover business law, employment law, commercial contracts and more.

5.a: We primarily operate in Benin, with a focus on Cotonou and the surrounding area. We can also handle matters in other cities and internationally depending on needs.

6.q: How do you guarantee confidentiality of my information?
6.a: Professional secrecy is core to our profession. All your information is strictly confidential and protected. We use secure systems and never share your data without explicit consent.

cta.title: Ready to solve your legal issue?
cta.subtitle: Don’t leave your legal questions unanswered. Our team is ready to support you with professionalism and dedication.

consultation.process_subtitle: Here is how your first meeting with our experts will unfold

0.title: 1. Careful listening
0.desc: We take the time to understand your situation, concerns, and objectives.

1.title: 2. In-depth review
1.desc: Detailed examination of your file and identification of key legal issues.

2.title: 3. Tailored options
2.desc: Presentation of available legal options and our recommendations.

3.title: 4. Clear proposal
3.desc: Transparent quote with detailed fees and a clear action plan.

consultation.form_subtitle: Fill out the form below and we will contact you shortly
consultation.placeholder_description: Explain your legal need in a few words...
consultation.privacy_notice: By submitting this form, you agree to be contacted by our team and accept our <1>privacy policy</1>.

0.a: Yes, absolutely. The first consultation is completely free and without obligation. It’s an opportunity to assess your situation and determine how we can help.

1.q: How long does the consultation last?
1.a: The consultation usually lasts between 45 minutes and 1 hour. We take the necessary time to fully understand your situation and advise you effectively.

2.a: If you have relevant documents (contracts, letters, etc.), we recommend bringing them. It will help us analyze your file more accurately.

3.q: Can the consultation be done online?
3.a: Yes. We also offer video consultations for greater flexibility. Indicate your preference when booking.

mentions.title: Legal notice
mentions.subtitle: Legal and administrative information about AXE LEGAL
mentions.editor_text: AXE LEGAL - Business law firm specialized in legal advisory for companies and individuals in Benin.
mentions.hosting_text: The website is hosted by the provider of your choice (technical hosting). For any request related to hosting, contact the publisher at contact@axelegal.bj.
mentions.ip_text: All content on this website (texts, images, logos, icons) is the property of AXE LEGAL or is used with permission of the rights holders. Any reproduction, representation or distribution, in whole or in part, is prohibited without prior authorization.
mentions.liability_text: Information is provided for informational purposes. AXE LEGAL makes every effort to ensure accuracy but cannot guarantee the absence of errors. Use of the information is under the user’s responsibility.
mentions.services_terms_text: Our services are provided in two ways: contract-based services (minimum duration: 3 months) billed monthly or quarterly, or one-off services billed per task/mission. Specific terms are detailed in our proposals and contracts.
mentions.contact_text: For any question regarding this legal notice, contact us: <1>contact@axelegal.bj</1> or call +229 01 97 74 75 93.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your personal data.
privacy.cookies_text: Our website uses technical and analytics cookies. You can manage your preferences in your browser. Cookies required for website operation are necessary and cannot be disabled without affecting certain features.
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell your data. It may be shared with technical providers (hosting, email tools) bound by confidentiality commitments.
privacy.security_text: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, alteration or unauthorized access.
privacy.rights_text: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have rights of access, rectification, erasure, restriction, objection and portability. To exercise your rights, contact us at <1>contact@axelegal.bj</1>.
privacy.retention_text: Data is retained for the period necessary for the purposes. Timeframes may vary depending on the nature of the data and legal obligations.
